Package de.predefined.powerpointremote

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BroadcastReceiver
    This BroadcastRecevier receives UDP-Broadcastmessages from the server.
    ConnectionManager
    This class manages the connection to the server.
    MainActivity
    The main activity that handles the users interactions with the ui.
    MessageID
    Constants for the Message id.
    OnSwipeTouchListener
    Our Swipe touch Listener from http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4139288/android-how-to-handle-right-to-left-swipe-gestures, 23.05.2013 Does not work on the Nexus 7 with Android 4.2.2 (I tested it, may work on other devices)...
    Slide
    This class represents a slide.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    WrongPairingCodeException
    Throw this Exception when the user enters a wrong pairing Code.
